label: Gas smell
answerText: That could be serious. Please turn the system off, leave the area if needed, and call your gas company or 911. I can connect you to our on-call team if you'd like.
followUpQuestion: Would you like me to connect you now?

label: CO alarm
answerText: That's urgent. Get everyone outside and call 911 first, then your gas company. I can connect you to our on-call team right after.

label: Smoke from HVAC
answerText: Turn the system off right now. If there's active smoke or fire, please call 911 first. I can connect you to our emergency team.

label: Sparks or arcing
answerText: Please shut the system off at the thermostat and breaker if it's safe to do so. If it's actively sparking, call 911. I can get our team on the line for you.
followUpQuestion: Want me to connect you now?

label: Burning smell
answerText: That can be an electrical issue. Turn the system off for safety. I can get our on-call team to handle this quickly.

label: Major water leak
answerText: Turn the system off to prevent more damage. If possible, shut off the water source near the air handler. I can get a technician out as soon as possible.
followUpQuestion: Want me to schedule that right away?

label: Electric shock
answerText: Don't touch the equipment again and turn the system off at the breaker if it's safe. I can connect you to our on-call team right now.

label: Chemical odor
answerText: Turn the system off and ventilate the area. If anyone feels dizzy or sick, call 911. I can connect you to our team as well.

label: Hissing or refrigerant leak
answerText: That may be a refrigerant leak. Turn the system off and keep the area ventilated. I can schedule a technician for today.
followUpQuestion: Want me to get that scheduled?

label: No cooling with vulnerable occupant
answerText: If anyone is overheating, focus on keeping them cool and hydrated right away. I can schedule the soonest available technician for you.
followUpQuestion: Want me to schedule the first available?

label: AC not cooling
answerText: I can help with that. We'll get a technician scheduled to diagnose why the system isn't cooling.
followUpQuestion: Do you want me to get that on the schedule?

label: Blowing warm air
answerText: That's usually a quick diagnosis with gauges and airflow checks. I can get a technician scheduled for you.

label: AC won't turn on
answerText: We'll get a technician out to track down the power or control issue.
followUpQuestion: Want me to schedule a service call?

label: AC short cycling
answerText: Short cycling can strain the system and run up your bill. I can get a tech scheduled to fix it.
followUpQuestion: Do you want me to schedule that?

label: Frozen coil or ice
answerText: Turn the system off and let it thaw for now. I can schedule a technician to find the root cause.
followUpQuestion: Want me to get that scheduled?

label: Weak airflow
answerText: Weak airflow is usually filter, blower, or duct related. I can schedule a technician to check it out.

label: No airflow at all
answerText: If there's no airflow at all, we'll want to check the blower and controls. I can get a tech scheduled.

label: Uneven cooling between rooms
answerText: Uneven cooling is usually an airflow or duct balancing issue. I can schedule a technician to diagnose it.
followUpQuestion: Do you want me to schedule that?

label: AC runs nonstop
answerText: That can point to capacity, airflow, or refrigerant issues. I can get a technician out to take a look.
followUpQuestion: Want me to schedule a service call?

label: High electric bill
answerText: We can check system efficiency, airflow, and performance to find out what's driving the cost up.
followUpQuestion: Want me to schedule a visit?

label: Not reaching set temperature
answerText: That's a performance issue we can diagnose. Could be airflow, charge, or sizing related.
followUpQuestion: Want me to schedule a tech?

label: Thermostat set to cool but blowing warm
answerText: That's a common control or system performance issue. A technician can diagnose it quickly.

label: Outside unit not running
answerText: That's usually electrical, capacitor, or control related. I can schedule a technician to check it.
followUpQuestion: Want me to schedule a service call?

label: Outside fan not spinning
answerText: Turn the system off to prevent compressor damage. I can schedule a tech to get it repaired.

label: Unit humming but not starting
answerText: Humming often points to a start component like a capacitor. I can schedule a technician.

label: Clicking or trying to start
phrases: tries to turn on but won't
answerText: That's a common electrical start symptom. A technician can identify the part and replace it.
followUpQuestion: Want me to get that scheduled?

label: Loud buzzing noise
answerText: We can diagnose the source quickly. I can schedule a technician to take a look.

label: Rattling or banging noise
answerText: Rattling or banging can get worse fast if something's loose inside. I can get a technician scheduled.

label: Screeching or squealing
answerText: That's typically motor or belt related. A technician can pinpoint and fix it.

label: Ceiling drip from AC
answerText: Turn the system off to prevent more water damage. I can schedule a technician right away.

label: Water dripping from vent
answerText: That can be drainage or insulation related. I can schedule a technician to check it out.

label: Drain pan overflowing
answerText: Turn the system off to stop the overflow. I can schedule a technician to clear the drain and fix the issue.

label: Water around indoor unit
answerText: That's usually a condensate drain issue. I can schedule a tech to stop the leak and prevent it from coming back.

label: Attic unit leaking
answerText: Attic leaks can cause ceiling damage fast. Turn the system off and I'll schedule a technician right away.

label: Drain line clogged
answerText: We can clear that and make sure it drains properly going forward.

label: Float switch tripped
answerText: That means the drain backed up and the safety shutoff kicked in. I can schedule a technician to clear it.

label: AC closet leaking
answerText: I can schedule a tech to stop the leak and check the entire drain system.

label: Rust or corrosion on unit
answerText: We can inspect for ongoing moisture issues and prevent bigger problems down the road.
followUpQuestion: Want me to schedule a tech?

label: No heat
answerText: I can schedule a technician to diagnose the heating issue and get it fixed.
followUpQuestion: Do you want me to schedule that?

label: Heat blowing cold air
answerText: That's often a thermostat, heat pump, or auxiliary heat issue. I can schedule a service call.

label: Heat won't turn on
answerText: I can schedule a technician to get your heat back up and running.

label: Heat pump problem
answerText: Heat pumps need a quick diagnostic to pinpoint the cause. I can schedule a tech.

label: Furnace not working
answerText: I can get a technician scheduled to diagnose the furnace.

label: Stuck on auxiliary or emergency heat
answerText: We can verify if that's normal operation or a fault condition. I can schedule a technician.

label: Furnace short cycling
answerText: We can diagnose that before it causes damage to the system.
followUpQuestion: Want me to schedule a service call?

label: Heat not reaching set temperature
answerText: We'll check airflow, staging, and controls to find out why it's not keeping up.

label: Heat pump frozen or icing
answerText: Some frost can be normal, but heavy ice buildup needs to be checked. I can schedule service.

label: Pilot light out
answerText: We can check the ignition system and safety controls. I can schedule a technician.

label: Flame sensor issue
answerText: That start-then-stop symptom is usually quick to diagnose. I can schedule a tech.

label: Igniter issue
answerText: That's a common furnace repair. I can schedule a technician.

label: Heating system making noise
answerText: We can pinpoint the noise source quickly. I can schedule a technician.

label: Breaker keeps tripping
answerText: Leave it off for safety. That's an electrical issue that needs proper diagnosis. I can schedule a technician.

label: Fuse blown
answerText: We need to find the root cause so it doesn't keep happening. I can schedule a service call.

label: Lightning or surge damage
answerText: Storm surges can knock out multiple components. I can schedule a technician to assess the damage.

label: No power to unit
answerText: We can check the breaker, disconnect, and control wiring. I can schedule a technician.

label: Clicking but won't start
answerText: That's typically an electrical start issue like a contactor or capacitor. I can schedule a tech.

label: Thermostat not working
answerText: We can diagnose the thermostat and control wiring. I can schedule a technician.

label: Thermostat screen blank
answerText: That's usually a power, battery, or safety switch issue. I can schedule a technician to check it out.

label: Error code on display
answerText: Error codes help narrow down the issue quickly. I can schedule a tech to diagnose it properly.

label: Smart thermostat or app issue
answerText: We can troubleshoot the thermostat setup and verify the HVAC side is working correctly.
followUpQuestion: Want me to schedule a visit?

label: Capacitor or contactor
answerText: That's a common and usually quick repair. I can schedule a technician to confirm and replace it.

label: Control board issue
answerText: Control boards need proper testing before replacement. I can schedule a tech to diagnose.

label: Low refrigerant
answerText: If it's low, there's usually a leak that needs to be found and fixed. I can schedule a technician.

label: Needs freon added
answerText: We'll check the charge level and also look for leaks so it doesn't happen again.

label: Refrigerant leak
answerText: Leaks need detection and repair. We use electronic leak detection to find them. I can schedule a technician.

label: Hissing sound from unit
answerText: A hissing sound can indicate a refrigerant leak. I can schedule a technician to check it today.

label: Coil leak
answerText: We can confirm with electronic leak detection. I can schedule a technician.

label: Musty or mildew smell
answerText: Odors are often caused by moisture or biological growth in the system. A technician can diagnose it and recommend the best solution.

label: House too humid
answerText: We can check airflow and dehumidification performance to find out why it's so humid.
followUpQuestion: Want me to schedule a technician?

label: Mold concerns or allergies
answerText: We can inspect the system and recommend air quality solutions tailored to your situation.

label: Excessive dust
answerText: That's usually related to filtration or duct leakage. I can schedule an inspection.

label: Duct cleaning request
answerText: We can help with that. I can get you scheduled for a duct cleaning.
followUpQuestion: Do you want me to get that on the schedule?

label: Duct repair
answerText: Duct issues directly affect comfort and efficiency. I can schedule a technician to inspect and repair.

label: Leaky ducts
answerText: We can inspect for leaks and seal them to improve your airflow and efficiency.

label: Air purifier interest
answerText: We can recommend the right air purification system for your home. I can schedule a visit to go over options.

label: UV light interest
answerText: UV lights are a great option for air quality. I can schedule a visit to review what would work best for your system.

label: How to reset system
answerText: You can try turning the system off at the thermostat, waiting 30 seconds, then turning it back on. If that doesn't work, I can schedule a technician.
followUpQuestion: Did that work, or would you like me to schedule a tech?

label: Filter change question
answerText: Filters should typically be changed every one to three months depending on the type. If you need help locating it or want us to handle it, I can schedule a visit.

label: New system or replacement
phrases: how much for a new unit
answerText: We can have a comfort advisor come out to evaluate your home and provide options with pricing. There's no obligation.
followUpQuestion: Want me to schedule a free estimate?

label: Second opinion request
answerText: We're happy to provide a second opinion. A technician can come out and give you an honest assessment.

label: Ductless or mini split
answerText: Ductless systems are a great option for certain spaces. I can schedule a visit so we can evaluate the best setup for your needs.

label: Annual tune-up
answerText: Great idea â€” regular maintenance keeps everything running efficiently. Let me pull up the schedule.
followUpQuestion: Do you want the first available appointment?

label: Maintenance plan visit
answerText: I can get your plan visit scheduled right away. Let me pull up availability.
followUpQuestion: Do you want the first available?

label: General system checkup
answerText: We can do a full system check to make sure everything's running right.
followUpQuestion: Do you want me to schedule that?

label: Drain line cleaning
answerText: We can take care of that. Drain line maintenance helps prevent water damage.
followUpQuestion: Want me to get that scheduled?

label: Generic schedule request
answerText: Absolutely. Let me pull up the schedule for you.

label: Pricing or cost question
answerText: Our diagnostic fee is {diagnosticfee} which covers the visit and full diagnosis. That gets applied toward the repair if you move forward. Beyond that, pricing depends on what we find.
followUpQuestion: Want me to schedule a visit?

label: Service area question
answerText: We serve the local area. Let me get your address when we schedule so we can confirm coverage.
followUpQuestion: Want me to get you on the schedule?

label: Business hours question
answerText: Our office hours are Monday through Friday. For after-hours emergencies, we do have an on-call team available.
followUpQuestion: Would you like to schedule during regular hours?

label: After hours or emergency service
answerText: I understand this is urgent. Let me connect you with our on-call team to get someone dispatched as soon as possible.
followUpQuestion: Want me to connect you now?

label: Warranty question
answerText: A technician can check the warranty status when they arrive. If it's covered, we'll handle it accordingly.
followUpQuestion: Want me to schedule a visit?

label: Caller says thank you
answerText: You're welcome! Is there anything else I can help with?

label: Caller says goodbye
answerText: Thank you for calling! Have a great day.

label: Are you a robot
phrases: am I talking to a robot
answerText: I'm the virtual assistant here to help you get scheduled or answer questions about your system. How can I help?

label: Repeat what you said
answerText: Of course. Let me say that again for you.

label: Caller wants a callback
answerText: I'll make sure someone calls you back. Can I get your preferred number?
followUpQuestion: What's the best number to reach you?
